task.title: Configuring contact points
task.shortdesc: You can set up contact points to specify how contacts receive notifications when an alert rule is triggered.

taskbody.prereq: You must have created the alert rule. See .

step.cmd: Navigate to the left-side menu, and then click Alerting Contact points .
Select a value from the Alertmanager drop-down list.

info.note: The default alert manager selected is Grafana.

step.cmd: Enter a name for the contact point in the Name field.
Select a type from the Integration drop-down list based on your requirements.

info.note: You must complete all mandatory fields in the Integration panel. For instance, if you select email, you must input the email addresses. If you choose Slack, you must enter the Slack channel(s) and the users who must be contacted.

step.cmd: Specify additional settings for the selected contact point integration in the Optional settings panel.
Select the Disable resolved message checkbox if you do not want to be notified when an alert resolves in the Notification settings panel.
Click Save contact point to save your changes.

taskbody.result: You have configured the contact point.
taskbody.postreq: You can edit, delete, or test a contact point that you created. For more information, refer to the Grafana documentation.
